      • configureBoard

        public void configureBoard(Client client,
                           MatchStart configuration)
        This method configure the board using the message received from the main Controller. This method needs to be called after the controller is instantiated.
        Parameters:
        client - reference of the Client instance
        configuration - configuration message

        Returns:
        the path of the image

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        killSequence - List of characters that killed somebody
        overkillSequence - List of boolean of the overkills (true if it is an overkill)
